A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its empire strikes back with a few elements of a new hope and return of the Jedi. So a rehashed movie just like Ep7. There is one interesting Plot line with Kylo and Rey\, but beyond that\, the logical inconsistencies frankly destroy what greatness is left in the Star Wars universe. I could rewrite the script of a new hope\, and return of the Jedi given how unbelievably powerful sending a hulk of metal through hyperspace is. Why bother with Death Star plans when ramming it at light speed will clearly do the trick. Anyway\, this movie sucks. Think Im done with Star Wars in general.
